product_name: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip Top - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A long-time classic for adults, The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top now offers boys the same lightweight warmth and easy pullover style. Lightweight polyester fleece is durable and pill-resistant. Quarter-zip opening at the neck provides ventilation and a pop of contrasting color. Pull the zipper all the way up the tall collar on The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top for extra warmth. Closeout.
short_description: A long-time classic for adults, The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top now offers boys the same lightweight warmth and easy pullover style.
